while i do love your balloons, i would love some blimp parts too! the ones in orther mods just don't.... work...

also, have you considered balloons with vents? like a hot air balloon; one with the ability to release a bit of pressure to maintain a specific altitude or speed?

Niiiiiice! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") Looking forward to the new parts

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/122617-113-buffalo-nasa-inspired-msev-fly-like-jetman-yves-rossy-with-the-jetwing-040/&do=embed&embedComment=2219256&embedDo=findComment"></iframe>

**[v0.4.0 Released](https://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects/kerballoons-v0-4-1) for KSP 1.1.3**

**Changelog**

    -Added 36 new balloons for Eve, Duna & Laythe
    
    -Added KerBalloons part category in VAB/SPH
    
    -Kerbals can now repack deflated (but not burst) balloons
    
    -All new models/textures for all KerBalloons parts
    
    -Probe cores removed from balloons
    
    -Fixed bug where moving horizontally could cause the balloon to lose lift
    
    -Fixed bug where balloons that had been inflated didn't load properly after quickloading/loading flight after returning to space centre
    
    -Various bugs fixed in lift calculations
    
    -Max payload is now stated in the part info as the max payload at max pressure. eg. 'Max Payload (Kerbin): 10t (at 105kPa)'
    
    -Ships including parts with older versions of KerBalloons are not compatible with KerBalloons v0.4.0

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-15T15:47:28Z" title="08/15/2016 03:47  PM" data-short="7 yr">August 15, 2016</time> by JoePatrick1**

Congrats on release!

2 questions:

1. I have 2 categories tabs in <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>\<abbr title="SpacePlane Hangar">SPH</abbr> - is it ok?

2. Is it possible to make some sort of selector of balloon pre-sets? I mean - there are too many balloon parts in category.

> 
> 
> 19 minutes ago, Horus said:
> 
> 
> Congrats on release!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 2 questions:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 1. I have 2 categories tabs in <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr></abbr></abbr>\<abbr title="SpacePlane Hangar"><abbr title="SpacePlane Hangar"><abbr title="SpacePlane Hangar">SPH</abbr></abbr></abbr> - is it ok?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 2. Is it possible to make some sort of selector of balloon pre-sets? I mean - there are too many balloon parts in category.
> 

Thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

1) You should only have one category. Ensure you are using 1.1.3 and have only one copy of the KerBalloons folder in GameData

2) I hope to do something like this for the next update but I was time constrained for this one. I wanted to get it out before I go away (in less than an hour from now)

Hmm, that is strange. Have you tried on a clean install as I wasn't getting this?

[@JoePatrick](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/94207-joepatrick/) Hi congrats on the update, re the duplicated categories in the post prior to yours, the source folder is within the GameData folder complete with another dll.  Inexperienced users are likely not to remove that source folder from the GameData and that may cause the issue of duplication. I suggest removing the source from inside GameData and make it available via sep download.

>

Just got home a few hours ago, will release an update later today fixing the multiple dlls

**[v0.4.1 Released](https://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects/kerballoons-v0-4-1) for KSP 1.1.3**

**Changelog**

    -Removed extra .dll in source folder which caused the plugin to load twice and therefore create two KerBalloons categories in VAB/SPH

**This version of KerBalloons is also available to download from <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>**

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-17T11:55:30Z" title="08/17/2016 11:55  AM" data-short="7 yr">August 17, 2016</time> by JoePatrick1**

Somehow 125BalloonS is now missing for me after upgrade. Should I replace it with kerbin125BalloonS ? Craft is on its very-very-very long way to Neidon (Outer Planets Mod).

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-17T07:50:06Z" title="08/17/2016 07:50  AM" data-short="7 yr">August 17, 2016</time> by Mattheus**

> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, Mattheus said:
> 
> 
> Somehow 125BalloonS is now missing for me after upgrade. Should I replace it with kerbin125BalloonS ? Craft is on its very-very-very long way to Neidon (Outer Planets Mod).
> 

Old versions of KerBalloons are incompatible with v0.4.0 without a little .cfg editing.  When I added different planet balloons, I had to change the names as otherwise I would have several with the same name (as there is a 1.25m Standard Balloon for each planet) which cause a lot of problems and is definitely not something you should have.  

If you want to fix it, the simplest solution would be to open the Kerbin 1.25m Standard config file (KerBalloons>Parts>KerbinBalloons>standard125.cfg) and change the 'name = kerbin125BalloonS' line to 'name = 125BalloonS' 

Just make sure you don't change any other balloons to this name as well.

Thanks! I took save file editing path, had two other landers also on the way with same baloon - so all have now kerbin's balloon versions. Dont know if they are even useful in gas giants tough ....

Just a thought, would it be very complicated to have a single balloon model that can be resized for different tanks and have a tweakable menu to set whether it is suitable for Kerbin, Eve etc?

Then you could greatly reduce the number of parts required.
